full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB PA'I MTHA'I RNAM PAR BZHAG PA RIN PO CHE'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,(CES PHYI NANG GI GRUB MTHA'I RNAM BZHAG MDOR BSDUS PA RIN PO CHE'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA GU SHRI NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG DANG, DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS CHU SPRUL CHU STOD ZLA BA'I YAR TSES LA SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RTA MGRIN TSE RING NGO,, ,,AOm SVASTI, RANG GZHAN GRUB MTHA'I RNAM GZHAG MDOR BSDUS 'DI, ,AO THOG PHYOGS KYI DAD BRTZON LDAN PA YI, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS ZHES BGYI BAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU, ,DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,THUB PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS PA DANG, ,YON BDAG 'DIS MTSON MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA KUN, ,GRUB MTHA' RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL PHYIN GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
